notes.text:
This update for jasper fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-27845: Fixed divide-by-zery issue in cp_create() (bsc#1188437).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A Divide-by-zero vulnerability exists in JasPer Image Coding Toolkit 2.0 in jasper/src/libjasper/jpc/jpc_enc.c
notes.title: Vulnerability description
